title: Critics decry Modi’s US visit as he begins day with UN yoga event
description: Calls mount for Biden to address human rights concerns during the Indian prime minister's Washington, DC, visit.

title: US Supreme Court justice faces questions over donor-financed trip

title: ‘Furious resistance’: Ukraine counteroffensive slowed by Russia

title: What’s being promised by Zimbabwe’s two main candidates?

title: Israel air strike hits ‘suspicious vehicle’ in West Bank attack

title: Desperate need for clean energy surge in the Global South: IEA

description: Wembanyama, a centre, has been lauded as a potential generational talent, compared to greats like LeBron James.
